name: Tiki Golf 2
summary:
Tiki Golf 2 redefines extreme minigolf!

Tiki Bobby is back and He has brought friends! 4 Playable Tikis! bunches unlockable secret clubs, golf balls and abilities! Ramps, mega power boosts, giant dartboard targets, huge hammers, loop-de-loops, pipes, pineapples, massive tiki totems and more! Exotic vibrant courses that have the iconic mini golf appeal but feel more like water park rides than typical putt putt courses!
